text: Wala wasidhani wakanushaji kwamba sisi tukiwarefushia umri wao, tukawastarehesha kwa starehe za duniani na tusiwaadhibu kwa ukafiri wao na madhambi yao kwamba watakuwa wamepata heri ya nafsi zao. Hakika tunawacheleweshea adhabu na ajali zao ili wazidishe dhuluma na ukeukaji mipaka. Na watapata adhabu yenye kuwadhalilisha na kuwatweza
